channel.title: Tor ticket 16052 (flooding attack)
channel.description:
I am running a hidden service over whonix and have been hit with the attack described here:
https://lists.torproject.org/pipermail/tor-dev/2015-May/008838.html
How can I implement the fix recommended in this suggested resolution on Whonix system?
Thanks Rabbit

item.title: Tor ticket 16052 (flooding attack)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian also in this specific case I think there will be no difference Debian vs Whonix. So if it works for Debian, it should work for Whonix as well.

Read full topic
